channel.title: Services on Career Orientation Days

item.title: Computer Science and Mathematics
item.description: The event is specifically focussed on Computer Science and Mathematics.

item.title: One-On-One Talks
item.description: Multiple 20 minute one-to-one converstations between companies and students.

item.title: Workshops and Lectures
item.description: The days will start with a workshop and throughout the day, there will also be talks about pursuing your career.
